taskbody.context:
The Knot has many events throughout the school year to help student bond and grow in their faith.
Sixth Grade Splash: Help to welcome in the new sixth graders by going to Bunker Hills Wave pool!
Koronis: (Fall) This is a retreat center that the students stay at for a weekend. At this event there are, leaders with lessons, free time time with the choice of a variety of games, food, and a campfire!
Acquire the Fire: (Early February) Students can attend this conference in downtown Minneapolis for a weekend! The event includes speakers, a worship band, food, and skits.
Mother's Day Skit: The group gets to be in charge of a Sunday Church service by putting on a skit to celebrate mothers!
Senior Sendoff: (May) Say goodbye to seniors by saying nice things and memorable experiences shared with them.
